ComicInfo.Summary:
THE SMASH-HIT SERIES CONTINUES!
The Decepticons have been unleashed! As Optimus Prime and Autobots regroup, Starscream terrorizes humanity.This issue features a surprising first Energon Universe appearance!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-02 23:48:47. [CVDB1028923]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Daniel Warren Johnson, Daniel Warren Johnson
ComicInfo.Inker: Daniel Warren Johnson, Daniel Warren Johnson
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Afu Chan, Alex Sinclair, Bryan Hitch, Daniel Warren Johnson, Michael Spicer, Orlando Arocena, Tom Reilly
ComicInfo.Characters: Beachcomber, Brawn, Carly Witwicky, Cliffjumper, Duke, Frosting , Ironhide, Jazz, Megatron, Optimus Prime, Ratchet, Roller, Rumble, Skywarp, Soundwave, Sparkplug Witwicky, Spike Witwicky, Starscream, Wheeljack
ComicInfo.Teams: Autobots, Decepticons, Mini-Cons, Seekers, United States Air Force, United States Army
ComicInfo.Locations: Cybertron, Earth, Farmingham, North America, Space
